Creates a bar graph with the given values and dates, using the max value to maintain a relative scale.
BetterController - Class in controller
This BetterController class uses a BetterStockModel, allowing for the tracking of portfolios over-time.
BetterController(BetterStockModel, Readable, AdvancedStockView) - Constructor for class controller.BetterController
Constructs a new BetterController object with the given model, readable, and view.
BetterPortfolio - Interface in model.portfolio
An interface for the betterPortfolio.
BetterPortfolioImpl - Class in model.portfolio
The BetterPortfolioImpl class represents a portfolio of stocks that is tracked over time, this is achieved by storing the commands that are executed on the portfolio at a given date.
BetterPortfolioImpl(File) - Constructor for class model.portfolio.BetterPortfolioImpl
Creates a new portfolio with the information stored in the given file.
BetterPortfolioImpl(String) - Constructor for class model.portfolio.BetterPortfolioImpl
Used for creating a brand new empty portfolio.
